title: Chukwudumaga
author: Chukwudumaga
content: A question arises in all of us that the world will ever be able to escape war and conflict? Because there was almost always war and conflict in the world and is constantly increasing. At this time from a small war, it is turning into a big one. New countries are added to intensify it. Every country is always active to protect their own interests. Political instability, climate change, risk of economic recession, etc., however, play a major role in deterring war. However, the main reason for this war is the arms race of the global superpower countries and the aim of increasing their business.Palestine and Israel have been in conflict for a long time. Israeli oppression of Palestinians continues. Every day which appeared as headlines in various newspapers.The first conflict of the 21st century started in Afghanistan, an Asian country. After the Twin Towers attack, the country was widely attacked for harboring terrorists. The war between Taliban and American soldiers started.But that war was not only in Afghanistan. Every year war has started in new countries. We have seen wars organized in Iraq in 2003, Libya in 2006, Syria in 2011, and Yemen in 2015. This war continues. Before the war, there was peace in those countries. There was economic prosperity. But because of the war, all those countries are broken today.Again, Myanmar was another country in Asia that was ruled by the military for more than 6 decades, but there are also various conflicts and wars going on in the country through a military coup in 2021, which has now turned into a civil war.Stability has not yet returned to Myanmar, and a fierce war has erupted between Russia and Ukraine. Russia's war with the West has caused massive losses and the war continues. Due to this war, the world economy has now had a major negative impact, including inflation. Thousands of people have already been killed in Russia and Ukraine.Considering the above situation, we can realize that this war will never end. War will not stop as long as there is arms trade. We will constantly see war somewhere in the world. Do you think that it is possible to stop the war?

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: I think you can agree with me that wars will never end. And with the events going on around the world, even with the ones you mentioned, it's just a clear interpretation of what was spoken in the Holy Book. In another angle, as long as there is a choice between good and bad, humans will always be at war with themselves over which side to be on. Some people say "we can resolve the war", but in all honesty won't because in a way, they seem to be getting something from it, either power or more arms or even the chance to prove superiority over the weaker one. But the truth still remains, war can't be stopped as long as man still has greed inherent in him.

comments.author: mu_enrico
comments.body: Quote from: Chukwudumaga on June 20, 2023, 07:14:51 AMDo you think that it is possible to stop the war?Do you mean wars that involve weapons, people shooting each other? Yes, at some point a large-scale war will mean the end of humanity because weapons will be so advanced and destructive to the point it will blow up the entire earth. So, yeah even a madman would think twice to push the nuke button.Anyway, I think the future wars would be in the case of information, economy, and tech wars. Whoever gets the upper hand will practically rule the world even if the border doesn't change.

These world powers will always fight among themselves in proxy wars so they will manipulate weak nations and push them to fight wars.

comments.body: Always people point at all kinds of things to make their conclusions. But conclusions about war on earth are never complete until people realize that God will bring peace through Jesus's return. Jesus will conquer all the armies of the earth that are unwilling to make peace.Look at what will happen to the world and the kingdoms of the world. It's recorded in the book of Daniel in the Bible. An excerpt is below, but go to the link and read the whole thing.Daniel 2:Quote from: https://biblehub.com/daniel/2.htm44In the days of those kings, the God of heaven will set up a kingdom that will never be destroyed, nor will it be left to another people. It will shatter all these kingdoms and bring them to an end, but will itself stand forever. 45And just as you saw a stone being cut out of the mountain without human hands, and it shattered the iron, bronze, clay, silver, and gold, so the great God has told the king what will happen in the future.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: We have the war among ourselves. If I am not mistaken, I can't recall again, I have said this before, "war only end when another war begins". War is not the absent of Peace but is the state of ignoring one another to have peace. If you want to count conflicts for a day, you will count more than 100 wars every day in the world. After the break out of the Russia and Ukraine war, I have heard plenty wars in the world. Talibans, Pakistans, Afghanistans a lot to mention. Even in my country, Boko Haram to Militia of the Niger Delta and the Eastern Security Network (ESN) etc. War is within us.The only time when will have peace in the whole world is when ruling class press our faces in the mud without dead. Please that is figuratively, and it means, when they kill us all and bury ours. Definitely when one died has peace because he would not see the things in this world again. War in one place affect another area. That was why a poet said, "we are all casualties of war". From the creation of the world war has not ended in the life of human. Human beings face one problem to another. When you think that you have solved one problem, another problem just emerged. And that is why people die untimely because the problems and challenges they face in the world. Peace comes from the peace of mind. And that is all. Once you have peace of mind then everything is fine with you.
